org.buildmlearn.appstore.adapters

Class CardViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CardViewAdapter.CardViewHolder>
      • org.buildmlearn.appstore.adapters.CardViewAdapter

  • public class CardViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CardViewAdapter.CardViewHolder>
    An Adapter class, which populates cards related to apps in various activities like HomeActivity, AppsActivity etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CardViewAdapter.CardViewHolder
      Holder class to contain all the views required during populating content into it.
